Pre-Game Insights: France have reached the final in three of their last four appearances at the World Cup and the European Championship.
Deschamps will stick with his tried-and-trusted 4-3-3 formation, with Antoine Griezmann and Marcus Thuram set to be restored to the XI after being rested against Poland.
Belgium may well end up dominating possession in this match, but they cannot match France for overall strength.
Les Bleus are defensively robust and will not give much away.
With Mbappe leading the charge, France have the quality to do damage at the other end.
